name: Kiwi
text: I'm a flightless bird who is native to New Zealand!

name: Kiwi
text: Hedgehogs are one of my predators... my eggs and babies are both preyed upon.

name: Kiwi
text: I'm an endangered species. Kiwi adults and eggs are eaten.

name: Kiwi
text: We depend on you humans to keep us safe, I trust you.
